title: Public/production publish workflow using the galfashionworld-2014 slug

requirements.summary: Ensure the production/public publish workflow references and validates the production slug galfashionworld-2014 and provides clear steps to publish the site as live/public (not draft/review).
acceptanceCriteria: The production/public publish workflow completes successfully without slug validation errors.
The workflow uses the slug "galfashionworld-2014" (matching frontend/domain-slug.json).
The resulting deployment is publicly accessible as the live/production version (not restricted to draft/review access).

file_operations.description: Update the production/public publish section to explicitly reference frontend/domain-slug.json as the single source of truth for the slug (galfashionworld-2014), and document the steps/checks required to publish as fully public/live (vs draft/review), aligning with the existing deployment checklist. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a small validation script that reads frontend/domain-slug.json and fails with a clear English message if productionSlug is missing or does not exactly equal "galfashionworld-2014"; this is used to prevent slug validation errors during the publish workflow. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a CI workflow that runs the production slug validation script on pushes/PRs affecting deployment-related files (e.g., frontend/domain-slug.json, frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md) to prevent accidental slug drift before attempting a public/production publish using the github-export-icp-cli template. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
